data.event: The town was formed in 1821 from the town of Jay.
In 1822, the name was changed, as suggested by a settler from Vermont, to "Wilmington" due to confusion with another "Dansville" in New York.

event.title: 1848, part of the town was partitioned off

data.event: In 1848, part of the town was partitioned off to form the town of St. Armand.
